com.funzio.pure2D.containers

Class VWheel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.funzio.pure2D.BaseDisplayObject
      • com.funzio.pure2D.containers.DisplayGroup
        • com.funzio.pure2D.containers.LinearGroup
          • com.funzio.pure2D.containers.VGroup
            • com.funzio.pure2D.containers.VWheel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Animator.AnimatorListener, Cacheable, Container, Wheel, Displayable, DisplayObject, InvalidateFlags, Manipulatable, Parentable, Touchable, UIObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VScroll

    public class VWheel
extends VGroup
implements Wheel, Animator.AnimatorListener
    Wheel is an extended Group that allows you to spin!
